title: Compile Annual Product Quality Review (APQR)
description: A QA specialist must compile the APQR, a regulatory requirement that reviews all data for a product over the past year.

tasks.description: Gather data for all batches manufactured in the last year, including yields and cycle times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts all relevant manufacturing data from the MES.

tasks.description: Gather all QC test results, stability study results, and environmental monitoring data for the period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts all relevant quality data from the LIMS.

tasks.description: Analyze the data for any trends, such as a slow drift in a specific test result over time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs trend analysis and finds no adverse trends.

tasks.description: Compile all data and analysis into the APQR report template and route for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts the complete APQR and routes it for signature.
